title: Field Remedy: 1959
subject:
Engine Z20LET, Turbocharger - Modified
cooling
complaint:
Cooling connection of the new P&A
turbocharger (part-no. 55559848 / catalogue-no.: 58 490 40) does
not fit to Speedster/VX220.
production:
Introduction of the new turbocharger cooling
as of MY2006 on Z20LER/LEL/LET engines.

remedyContent.text:
In case of replacement of the turbocharger (part-no.: 55559848 /
catalogue-no.: 58 490 40)on Speedster/VX220 the new P&A
turbocharger has to be modified as follows.

Remove the upper cooling pipe. Dismount the plug (mounted
sidewards on bearing housing) and install it with a new sealring
instead of the cooling pipe. Sealring part-no.: 11016282 /
catalogue-no.: 20 91 057.
